channel.title: Problems with PlayScape
channel.description:
Hey, um... I'm having some serious issues with playscape right now: Using Cheez 80...
Firstly, when the server is up and running fine, everybody will be kicked randomly. When I look at the server screen, it'll have normal stuff, then all the sudden: [code]saving for _____ ___ disconnected saving for _____ ___ disconnected saving for _____ ___ disconnected[/code] (with ___ being actual names) I've tried to find out what is causing this, its not a bug, because what happens before everybody is kicked is different, so its not a command issue or anything. I get no errors, Please help. Thanks
Second problem: The auto-saver works fine, but if you are being saved otherwise (being kicked, logging out, etc.) it won't save your character, it just says: [code] Saving for _____ could not save for _____ _____ disconnected[/code]
Third:
The server will randomly freeze after a while, the server window will just stop moving, and stay at one thing (no, no errors) usually just somebody's auto save, or a command or something. And everybody will be kicked, but it doesn't show anything on the window, because it just freezes.
Thanks for helping![br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 02:15:21 AM[/size][hr]Anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 06:31:10 PM[/size][hr]Please?

item.title: Problems with PlayScape
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Cheez worked fine for me for a long while. And I’m beyond the point of just “switching” sources. I have 60k lines in Client, as well as a bunch of other java files, cfg, and other homemade things.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with PlayScape
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Switch to Testscape. If a server scource doesnt work for you, move on to a new one that does.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with PlayScape
item.dc:creator: @mrdek11 mrdek11
item.description:
@mrdek11 wrote:

Hey, um… I’m having some serious issues with playscape right now:
Using Cheez 80…

Firstly, when the server is up and running fine, everybody will be kicked randomly. When I look at the server screen, it’ll have normal stuff, then all the sudden:

saving for _____ ___ disconnected saving for _____ ___ disconnected saving for _____ ___ disconnected
(with ___ being actual names)
I’ve tried to find out what is causing this, its not a bug, because what happens before everybody is kicked is different, so its not a command issue or anything.
I get no errors, Please help. Thanks

Second problem:
The auto-saver works fine, but if you are being saved otherwise (being kicked, logging out, etc.) it won’t save your character, it just says:

Saving for _____ could not save for _____ _____ disconnected

Third:

The server will randomly freeze after a while, the server window will just stop moving, and stay at one thing (no, no errors) usually just somebody’s auto save, or a command or something.
And everybody will be kicked, but it doesn’t show anything on the window, because it just freezes.

Thanks for helping![br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 02:15:21 AM[/size][hr]Anybody?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 06:31:10 PM[/size][hr]Please?

Read full topic
